div.div: Next school year is coming soon. Click "Read full story" to read more info!
Please click "Read full story" to read the latest information on school closures from Superintendent Knoll.

A Special Board of Education Meeting has been scheduled for Friday, March 20, 2020, at 8:30 a.m., in the Board of Education room at the District Administrative Center. Click "Read Full Article" to see a link for the official announcement.
Please continue to read the latest information on school closures.

article.aria-label: Info Regarding Friday Night Football Game (11/1/19)

h3.a: Info Regarding Friday Night Football Game (11/1/19)

div.div: Please continue on to see a message regarding our Friday night football game.
Please take a moment to read the following communication regarding the application of mosquito pesticides within Edwardsburg Public Schools.

Good Afternoon Edwardsburg Families.
Please take a moment to read the following communication regarding Eastern Equine Encephalitis. Also attached is a tip sheet from the State of Michigan about controlling mosquito populations at home.
Thank you.
Please continue reading for more important information regarding Eastern Equine Encephalitis.
